content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Orchestrator allows connecting to the AWS console using the native Maestro CLI tools. The AWS Console gives temporary access to most of the Amazon Web Services which can be used even without running any virtual resources in the AWS Cloud.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before accessing the AWS Management Console, make sure that you have the appropriate permission granted by the Project Manager or Project Coordinator.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Run the following command in the Maestro CLI: or2awsmc -p project_id\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will receive an email containing the link to the console. The access is provided for one hour, afterwards the connection is closed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ca8bfb82-ec01-4a9d-b3a0-9b71ef1e4d61/image2016-12-6%2017:1:4.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":648,\"height\":335}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
